name: node computation
desc: Use a Python script to manipulate the value or coordinates of a field.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Nodal Computation Variables 1
properties.desc: The Variables to use to set the values during computation.

properties.name: Nodal Computation Variables 2
properties.desc: The Variables to use to set the values during computation.

properties.name: Data Definitions
properties.desc: The data you wish to generate in addition to coordinates.

properties.name: Edit Script In Editor
properties.desc: This opens a script editor for the selected Python script.

properties.name: Create Default Script
properties.desc: This creates a default script file, and assigns it to the Filename parameter.
